content: de nederlandse versie van dit patroon is gratis te vinden bij www gekophaken nl this is a pattern for a poncho sweater using tunisian crochet it contains detailed written instructions and photo instructions on the used stitches i used 4 skeins 1 more for size xl-3xl of julia yarn from the dutch store zeeman weight bulky 7 wpi 100 gr/170 m 3 oz ½ / 186 yards which is used with tunisian hook size 10mm crochet hook size 7mm for the sleeves optional however any other bulky yarn can be used with which gauge can be obtained sizes available s-l xl-3xl gauge 10 st x 8 st= 10cm /4 skill level beginner it contains a pdf pattern which can be downloaded in english eng in which i make use of u s terminology ** this pattern is copyright to madebyjori and for personal use only you are not allowed to copy share or resell my pattern online/ offline translate without permission and edited as part or in whole or as youtube tutorial products made with madebyjori patterns are allowed to be sold however i would appreciate it when you credit me by linking to madebyjori as the designer **
